feed.title: Lac La Biche - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Lac La Biche
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lac La Biche 4:00 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 1.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 0.3°C
Wind: W 17 km/h gust 33 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 4:03 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:03 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:03 PM MST Friday 10 February 2023
